alert.note: Alert for Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 8:58PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Seminole and northwestern Orange Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 858 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winter Garden, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Altamonte Springs, Ocoee, Winter Garden and Lake Apopka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
